channel.title: How do i make a mod or admin without these glitches?!?!?!?
channel.description:
when i make somebody a moderator or a administer....they cant use the ::commands how do i fix this?!?!?
btw how do i make it so that you dont have the crown by your name (only visible by other people) how tdo i change that??!?!?!

item.title: How do i make a mod or admin without these glitches?!?!?!?
item.dc:creator: @Oo_Java Oo Java
item.description:
@Oo_Java wrote:

go to client.java and search /admin,

go down and change the name between “” to your name and what that guy said change to what you want to be.
